healthcareChecklist.taskName: Do you have any symptoms of illness ? (Fever, Cough, etc) ?
Have you taken any medication that could impair your driving ? ?
Have you consumed alcohol in the last 24 hours ?

vehicleChecklist.taskName: Are all lights functioning properly ? (Headlights, Tail Lights, Indicators)
Is the tire pressure adequate and are the tires in good condition ?
Is the engine oil level appropriate ?
Is the fuel level sufficient for the trip ?
